answers.answer: I'm nit really sure what they should weigh but i got my ultrasound laat week at 36 weeks and my baby weighed 6lbs 4 ozs they estimated. and said that was just a little under the average
I'm 33 weeks And baby weights 4 pounds. I was told by my midwife that she is little. More I'm wondering what's a good weight.
At my 31 weeks scan,  which was my last ultrasound,  baby girl weighed 3 lbs, 10 oz.I wish i knew what she weighed now...

I just had an ultrasound today to check weight due to the fact I'm on metformin for gestational diabetes and my baby is weighing in at 6lbs 13 oz. They said everything looks good tho. So I'm not sure what the "normal" weight is because everyone is different! Good luck
